title: Flower Pot
medium: creamware with overglaze decoration in red and black
markings: original mark: A/overglaze black; see catalogue card. Also, object marked by Eleanor Garnier Hewitt with a red star, a sign of imputed distinction.
description:
semi-ovoid, flat bottom with ring base, pierced at centre - greenish black bands and curving band of sprigged decoration in red.
[one of a pair]

tombstone.epitaph:
Flower Pot.
creamware with overglaze decoration in red and black. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-421-b.
